name: Parallel Wor(l)ds
description:
Libgdx september Jam contest!

DO NOT PLAY THE HTML VERSION YET... IT's ONLY EXPERIENCE IN PORTING THE DESKTOP VERSION TO GWT...

USE THE DESKTOP VERSION BELOW IF YOU WANT TO PLAY.

You have parrallel wor(l)ds in words... .

World  1 : a-e-s

World 2 : b-d-g-p-q

World 3 : f-t-j-r 

World 4 : i-l-o-c

World 5 : k-x-z-h-y

World 6 : n-u-v-m-w

letter  initial random list of letter is guided by proportion of occurences of each letter in each different language.

There is a chance for you to win ... well hard to say what win mean?

After each Panic event, the available time is reduced.

Warning,  you cannot reuse the same word twice!

Available in : english - francais - Espanol - Deutsch
